file_content.text: You trespass, Jedi. Guardian Hold Four now belongs to the Emperor.
This is a Republic fortress, on a Republic world. I am restoring its rightful ownership.
I disagree.
Even after one of your own welcomed us in?
I came for a Child of the Emperor.
Where's the traitor?
The honored daughter is out of your reach. We will see to it.
Whoever you're supposed to be, you're in my way.
Stand aside.
We are the Imperial Guard. The Emperor's chosen. We live and die as he commands.
And his First Son will secure our victory. I see your weaknesses, Jedi--and how to shatter you.
A true Jedi knows how to bend, and so can never be broken.
I don't "shatter."
Empty words are no defense against us.
The Force will sustain me.
I can resist you.
I and Herald are teeth and claws of Scorekeeper.
And I've always been told my assertiveness is my finest quality.
Yeah, we can't surrender--I hear the paperwork's murder.
I don't have weaknesses. Not against Imperials.
Father didn't give up. Neither will I!
Your overconfidence will be your undoing.
You're still dead.
You will never reach the honored daughter. One by one, your Republic fellows will turn. All is lost, Jedi.
